data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 10,349 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Uvéa, Wallis and Futuna Islands
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 10,700 people living in Uvéa through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next month in Uvéa, Wallis and Futuna Islands.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Uvéa. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Uvéa, Wallis and Futuna Islands find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Mata-Utu
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Mata-Utu, Uvéa, Wallis and Futuna Islands.
Spirit, train the church of Uvéa, Wallis and Futuna Islands to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 187 believers in Uvéa to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.section_summary:
the state of Uvéa, Wallis and Futuna Islands has a population of 10,700.

We estimate Uvéa has 187 people who might know Jesus, 10,349 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 164 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 57 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Uvéa, Wallis and Futuna Islands.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
